name: Memory Frames
description:
Memory Frames tests your brain memory. The Elements, Water, Earth, Wind, Fire, creates notes patterns by pushing Frames. You must repeat this Elements note pattern using your memory ability, each Frames is associated with a color and note, Blu for water, Yellow for Earth, Green for Wind and Red for Fire! These Elements help you to remember as the correct pattern. Record your best scores and enjoy playing anywhere.

Key Features:

• Amazing graphics
• Cool relaxed sound music
• The difficult increase by 1 frame
• Improve your brain memory
• Ideal for all family

Great Game great Fun!
